name: OveRRooT [pre-alpha demo]
description:
>>> You are R00T_

A sophisticated malware created with a sole objective: bypass the defenses of malfunctioning computer systems by erasing their cyberspace, in order to reset them to their default state and bring them back to life again.

Now it's time for you to take on a new job, in a new system.

Nothing more than just the same old routine... probably.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>_

>>> DEMO v0.9.5 (pre-alpha)_

A short demonstration of Root's capabilities, including the training areas and the first system level.

Combine the several skills at your disposal and use them to break through your enemies defenses and progress to the next system sector.

NB: Gamepad use is suggested. Some assets are intended to be placeholder only, and so they won't be in the final release.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>_

>>> FINAL RELEASE_

We're still in active development, with a planned release for 2023. Feel free to send us feedbacks to improve the game, through in-game survey link or directly in the comments section below.

Stay tuned and follow us on social pages if you want to know more! We'll post more updates as we carry on development!

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>_

>>> CREDITS_
  • Damiano Borsa - Direction, Level design, Co-producing
  • Simone Bucarini - Co-producing, Technical level design, VFX, Additional programming
  • Alfredo Sasso - Game design, Combat design
  • Francesco La Rovere - Game design, AI design
  • Giuseppe Caruso - Gameplay, Player and AI programming
  • Marco Scutti - Technical UI/Narrative design, Writing, Additional programming
  • Federico Magnanimi - Soundtrack
  • Angelo Peluso - SFX

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>_
